animal.name: Ruby
animal.description:
Say hello to Ruby! Miss Ruby is a one and a half year old Staffordshire terrier. This precious girl was found by her foster mom sadly abandoned in a crate on the side of the road. She

is a sweet and

loving dog despite her ruff past. Her favorite activities include cuddling on the couch

, eating, and going for walks. Ruby is housetrained and working on basic commands

like sit and down. She is crate-trained and doesn't mind lounging there in her comfy bed while you're away.

Although she's over a year old, Ruby

still has plenty of p

uppy energy and typically g

reets people with the same, enthusiastic, puppy joy

and may try to wiggle into laps and lick faces. She is eager to please, quick to respond to corrections, and will be easy to train.

Ruby is adjusting well to home life after being abandoned and spending some time at the shelter. She loves all people and meeting new people is fun and exciting. She's a curious dog and loves to explore, but at the same time can be timid in new situations and easily startled. With training and socialization in her new home, Ruby's confidence and spirit will continue to blossom.

1 1/2 years old

house trained

crate trained

good with big and small humans (babies unknown)

good with dogs of all sizes

heartworm negative

the BEST ears and tiny jowlies

loves belly rubs and ear rubs

NO cats or small animals

Please contact us at PacoCorpRescue@gmail.com to set up a meet and greet with Ruby! 1/31/22 1:08 PM
